game.description: Escape Locke Manor by discovering hidden objects, hunting for clues, solving puzzles, and ultimately cracking the final riddle of the deranged cult whom you call family.
game.history: The game had its inception when Juan and Maciej had to come up with something for an assignment at university.

features.feature: An atmospheric escape room game filled with mystery and intrigue.
Solve puzzles, find clues, and learn dark family secrets.
Play multiplayer with up to 4 friends, or play solo!
Explore a beautifully crafted Victorian manor dripping with the occult.
